info.name: Redblox for ROBLOX
info.description:
[In development]
Redblox doesn't just make things red.
info.additionalInfo:
[v0.4]:
- Continued group page overhaul; not done
- Color change
- Various improvements to other elements
[v0.3]:
- Begun full Firefox support (should work anyway without it but whynot)
- Group page overhaul started
[v0.2]:
- Various webkit transition improvements
- Support for player profiles and friends page
- Various efficiency improvements
[v0.1]:
- Initial release

data.title: I couldnt download the syle because the button was useless
